snippet.title: American Fugitive - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
OUT NOW on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/934780/American_Fugitive/
OUT NOW on Nintendo Switch: https://www.nintendo.co.uk/Games/Nintendo-Switch-download-software/American-Fugitive-1557415.html
OUT NOW on Xbox One: https://www.microsoft.com/en-gb/p/american-fugitive/c48ljqlv397r?activetab=pivot:overviewtab
OUT NOW on PlayStation 4: https://store.playstation.com/#!/cid=EP4395-CUSA13958_00-0000000000000000

Subscribe now for more news and updates: https://bit.ly/2AMyqSx

---

American Fugitive is out now on PC and consoles! Discover an action-packed open-world sandbox game inspired by classic GTA and action movies from the 80-90s. The game offers a new 3D top-down single-player experience where you can STEAL, DRIVE and FIGHT.

Set in 1980s middle-America within a sleepy rural town, American Fugitive invites you to play as Will Riley. By no means a killer, but no angel either, you face life in prison for a crime you didn’t commit. Fuelled by grief over the cold-blooded murder of your father, and armed with a burning desire for vengeance you’ll need to break out of jail to find the real culprit. Simply put: It's payback time. 

JUSTICE AIN'T ALWAYS LEGAL.
